transArray.content: The service attitude is very good, the location is good, the front desk is friendly, I am very satisfied, I will stay here again next time

Hello dear guest! Thank you for staying at Orange Beijing Wukesong Hotel and taking your precious time to share your stay experience with us. It is our honor to be able to provide you with warm service and a clean and comfortable stay environment. As you said, the hotel is located in the West Fourth Ring Road In the Badili Automobile Park on the auxiliary road, there are parking spaces shared with the park. There are sufficient parking spaces and convenient parking. Thank you for your support and recognition, which makes all the staff of Orange Beijing Wukesong Hotel confident on the road ahead. We look forward to working with you. Every encounter! I wish you all the best! Manager: Ren Yuanyuan
